com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.server.service
Interface GameWorldService

All Superinterfaces:
GameWorldManager, com.sun.sgs.service.Service
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameWorldServiceImpl
public interface GameWorldService
extends com.sun.sgs.service.Service, GameWorldManager

The GameWorldService provides utility methods to calculate collision detection and spatial information against the static game world geometry.

Owen Kellett
